Author: WhenTheLastStoneFalls

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,205Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 6

Summary: After a virus wipes out half of the population, Buck, Eddie, and the 118 face a new world, where shifters and humans have to work together more than ever. Separated by Gerrard's fascist viewpoint towards anything non-human, they navigate a new reality, where getting Chris home seems impossible, finding Maddie seems improbable, and hiding their relationship becomes more complicated as each day passes.Set sometime after the beginning of Season 2.

entry.title: Big Boy
entry.summary:
Author: Tamystardust

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,129Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck had always liked the nicknames Eddie used for him. He had particularly liked Cowboy, but since the lightning strike, Eddie didn’t use it anymore."Big Boy" was new, and got Buck all putty-like in Eddie’s hands, and he didn’t even know why. Eddie probably didn’t even mean it in any particular way. Afterall, he had no problem saying it in front of everybody else, so Buck didn’t know why it affected him so much.

entry.title: Crawling back to you
entry.summary:
Author: singomuse7

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,073Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 99

Summary: “Don’t talk about Buck,” Eddie says. “He,”There’s not much he can say without outing himself, so he stops short. Inhales. Exhales. Inhales. Exhales.“Look,” Eddie says, firm, “Chris is my son. And I get to decide where we live.”“Oh, Eddie,” Helena says, voice full of pity. “Please don’t force our hand.”“Force your hand?”“To fight for his custody.”“What?” Eddie asks with quiet disbelief. His brain is in the process freezing completely, his veins ice cold.He knows his parents don’t like him. He’s known that his whole fucking life. But this? This is too much. And worse, it’ll hurt Chris. Turn him into the same mess Eddie is.“He needs stability and security. Something he clearly didn’t have until very recently. We’d been thinking about it ever since you got shot. Then he called us, and we’d fully decided but, you just let him go and we thought we wouldn’t need to. But now,”Eddie’s breathing gets increasingly heavier until he collapses.orThe Diaz parents Diaz parent and Eddie has a panic attack, so Buck drops everything and flies (not) straight to El Paso. They find their way home.

entry.title: Every Story Has A Beginning, Middle, And End But Not Necessarily In That Order
entry.summary:
Author: Mariereads167

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,979Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 4

Summary: Sometimes love doesn’t knock—it quietly moves in, settles on the couch, makes coffee in the morning, and slips into your heart when you’re too busy dancing around it to notice.And every great story has a beginning, middle, and end. But not necessarily in that order. Nothing in Eddie Diaz’s or Evan Buckley’s life has happened linearly so far, but it has occurred nevertheless. And them falling in love with one another is not another exception.OR:There are better no roommates than Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz, and there is no state more natural for the pair of best friends than living together under one roof.They have a routine, you see. One they had down before they even lived together, but now that they do, it's like second nature.Buck, Eddie, and Christopher have a long summer ahead of them living in one house. And it’s a season filled with:Kitchen mishaps and New RecipesBarbecues and Family LoveZoo visits and Science CampsHeat Waves and Ballroom DancingA love confession. Or Two?Stolen glances, Secret kisses in their dreamsDangerous Calls That Threaten To Put Everything In PerilAnd so, so much more...

entry.title: Till forever falls apart.
entry.summary:
Author: Idachen

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,196Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 72

Summary: May hated guns. For several reasons. She hated the sound they made, sharp and deafening, like a crack splitting the air in two. She hated what they were used for, the way they symbolized power in all the worst ways. And most of all, she hated how easy it was for just anyone in this damn country to get their hands on one. It terrified her.Tamara hated them too. They could hate them together.

entry.title: Lieutenant Buckley
entry.summary:
Author: nlpiersee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,020Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 191

Summary: "You, firefighter Buckley, are now Interim Captain for A-shift, station 118, effective immediately.” Buck pursed his lips, seeing the hard look in the man’s eyes telling him to keep his mouth shut. “When all of them, Captain Nash, Paramedics Wilson and Han, and Firefighter Diaz, the whole A-shift clique, are cleared medically, you will no longer be part of their team.”“Are you temporarily promoting me and firing me at the same time?” Buck asked incredulously.“No, I am not. You will no longer be part of their team, because you will report directly to me. You will become a floater at whatever station I tell you you are floating at for whatever duration I direct. You have the most qualifications and certifications of any firefighter in LA, only missing your paramedic certification. I was informed you would pass if you ever actually applied for and took the exam.”---“And I don’t get a say?”“Not if you want to remain a member of the LAFD.” Chief Simmons said with finality. They stared at one another for a few more tense moments before the Chief straightened up and left Buck alone in the Captain’s office.
